text: Horst Janson (4 October 1935 – 19 January 2025) was a German actor. His career began in 1958. He was known for his roles in The Buddenbrooks, A Glass of Water, Das Riesenrad (1961), and Escape from East Berlin (1962). Janson suffered from a stroke in 2024. On 19 January 2025, he died from stroke- related problems in Grünwald, Germany, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:People from Hesse
title: Horst Janson (actor)
